fields.name: CropRectangle
fields.description: An optional rectangular window used to crop the overlay image or video.

fields.name: Opacity
fields.description: The opacity of the overlay. This is a value in the range [0 - 1.0]. Default is 1.0 which mean the overlay is opaque.

fields.name: Position
fields.description: The location in the input video where the overlay is applied.
